front.div:
The main demands to be met by modern steel
production are high productivity, high production
flexibility and a high product quality level.
Robots are common in operation in high
productivity, reproducible and flexible industries,
for example, in car assembling manufacture.
Now, Siemens VAI, as a pioneer in innovating
processes, technologies and automation at steel
plants, introduces a robot suitable for the harsh
operation conditions and rough environment
at casters, secondary metallurgical plants,
converters and also EAFs.
Our answer to these demands is an extremely fast
Siemens VAI robot performing fully automatic
temperature and sample measurements cycles
including cartridge replacement, so that manual
and even manipulator measurement are obsolete.
Your challenge:
Personnel health and safety when working in the
vicinity of steel, slag and extremly hot environment
is our main concern. The steelplant managers take
full responsibilty regarding health and safety of their
employees as well as strict compliance with the
associated legislation.
A further issue is accuracy and reliability in
performing measurement and taking samples during
production, having direct influence on the quality
of the produced steel and on productivity thanks to
faster cycle times and less measurement errors.
Our solution:
With the SIMETAL LiquiRob, Siemens VAI provides a
highly flexible robot-aided measuring and sampling
solution that gives you the flexibility and reliability
needed to ensure uninterrupted, fail-safe and
controlled EAF steel production.
The SIMETAL LiquiRob will replace mechanical
manipulators benefiting from higher availibility and
easy upgrading and learning of new operations. In
many cases it will prevent operators from making
temperature or celox measurements or taking
samples. Thanks to the SIMETAL LiquiRob, work in
hazardous areas is largely eliminated.
